directions: Stir nacho cheese soup, refried beans, sour cream, and salsa together in a small saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir until smooth and warm, about 10 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed nacho cheese soup (such as Campbell's® Fiesta Nacho Cheese)
1 (8 ounce) jar chunky-style salsa (such as Pace®)
title: Fiesta Bean Dip
